title: Dlala Preschool and Kindergarten Graduation Cap Gown Stole Package 2023 Tassel Set for Kids, Certificate
features: PACKAGE INCLUDES: This graduation set includes one shiny gown, one shiny cap with an elastic band for a tight fit, one tassel with a 2023 charm, one 2023 graduate sash, two 2023 rings (fit for a child), one preschool diploma and one kindergarten diploma.

GREAT DESIGN: 100% shiny polyester, breathable, comfortable. Useful hidden color-matched zipper, reinforced shoulder yoke, neck&pleat piping. Machine wash or dry cleaning, hanging, and ironing at low temperatures are recommended to keep the gown flat.

SIZE CHOOSE: To determine the size, measure each childâ€™s height from the top of their head to the floor while the child is wearing shoes. See the size chart image to convert height into gown size for each boy and girl graduate. Small (3' - 3'9"), Medium (3'10" - 4'1"), Large (4'2" - 4'5")
PERFECT FOR ANY GRADUATION: Our matte child cap and gown set is an adorable option to celebrate your little ones' Head Start, Preschool, and Kindergarten graduation.
BEST GIFT: Ideal keepsake for marking every milestone, kindergarten, and elementary. It makes an awesome companion for kids!
description: Graduation is a special time of life when you transition from one goal in life to another.
Make it a day to remember with your own 'mini graduation'.
1 pc Matte Graduation Robe for Boy or Girl
1 pc Matching Colored Tassel with Removable 2023 Year Charm
1 pc preschool diploma and 1pc kindergarten diploma
Comfortable and breathable shiny polyester fabric, not heavy fabric, but it also won't be transparent, this new fabric treatment enables the garment to resist shrinking, pilling and fading.

Easy to Clean and Save, Gowb fits Machine Wash or Dry Clean, since the cap is made with thick cardboard, the hat cannot be washed. It is recommended to iron the garment before wearing it for the first time.
